name: The truth is out there
description:
You are in the Copernicus star.

Your task is to kidnap as many animals as possible for experiments. But watch out for unnecessary things! You'll find yourself on different planets and routes to them. Farmers, meteorites and time stand in your way. Use the power of disappearing, teleporting and kidnapping to get the highest end result. It will decide of your skills.

Can you manage the task?
